str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A festival, feast, periodically recurring. Of uncertain affinity; a festival.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(in the neutral plural) specially (by implication) the Passover week.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
The feast of Passover, the Passover lamb. Of Chaldee origin; the Passover.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Trans: I bring near; intrans: I come near, approach. From eggus; to make near, i.e. approach.
